title: Sinatra
subtitle: A web app for building shareable Spotify music profiles
summary: A web-app that lets Spotify users create public pages for their music taste.
description: Sinatra was the first full-stack app I've developed. After being shown the ropes to online databases (MongoDB) and deployment servers (Google Console), Sinatra ran through five major iteratations. Sinatra went from a static JavaScript page to a dynamic FastAPI-JSX website.

title: Cartara
subtitle: An AI-assisted visualizer of geopolitics and current events.
summary: Cartara is a map-based visualizer of geopolitics and current events that use modern APIs and LLMs to dynamically depict the world in action.
